help-file.title: "SPIRIT WALK"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Spiritual
This spiritual spell allows the caster to cross the boundaries of the outer planes and seek the lifeforce of the dearly departed. After the lost soul has been found, a mystical conduit is opened between the Spiritualist, the soul and the soul's corporeal body, pulling the caster to the last site of death. However, if the corporeal body has been embalmed, or tampered with via other forms of preservation, this spell has unpredictable results.
